title: NVIDIA’s deal to buy Arm has reportedly collapsed
content:
While NVIDIA announced plans to acquire U.K.-based chip designer Arm from SoftBank all the way back in September 2020, the company has run into several regulatory hurdles since then. Major companies including the likes of Qualcomm, Microsoft, and Google raised concerns about NVIDIA’s acquisition of the company, claiming that the deal would harm competition in the

The post NVIDIA’s deal to buy Arm has reportedly collapsed appeared first on xda-developers.
description: NVIDIA's deal to buy Arm has reportedly collapsed, marking an uncertain future for the U.K.-based chip design company. Read more here.
